name: Game Based On The Results To A Vote That People Had
name_original: Game Based On The Results To A Vote That People Had
description:
Some people didn't want it to happen. Some people thought that this was rushed and it should have had more time. Some people thought this was a complete waste of time and should not have been suggested in the first place.

A vote was had. People voted in a poll that had a simple Yes or No in it and the majority voted for Yes. And now that the dust has settled it's now time to face the full consequences of that decision.

Game made by Afal with music by Weird BIAS

Made for AwfulJams 2016 for the theme "Games For Grandpa"
